message.body: Bowling is officially cancelled. See u next week.
Rats. Okay, it'll be my last one :-( Hope you made it though the storm without problems.
Made it thru. Lost power yesterday. And u
Ok. Never lost power, but wind was ripping siding off my neighbor's house and flinging it into mine. Still got off easy, considering.
We lost a few big trees but nothing bad. Glad u were good. See u next week.
